snippet: The journalist Mohamed Fahmy, who faces a retrial in Egypt on terrorism charges, says he has filed a lawsuit against his employer, accusing it of negligence.
abstract: Journalist Mohamed Fahmy, naturalized Canadian who gave up Egyptian citizenship and is now facing terrorism charges in Egypt, files suit in Canada claiming that he and others were endangered by skewed priorities of his employer Al Jazeera.
lead_paragraph: The journalist Mohamed Fahmy, who faces a retrial in Egypt on terrorism charges, says he has filed a lawsuit against his employer, accusing it of negligence.

headline.print_headline: Middle East; Egypt: Journalist Sues Al Jazeera
